flawed_nl_solution:
At least one person lives in 17/20 * 120 = <<17/20*120=102>>102 apartments.
At least two persons live in 3/5 * 120 = <<3/5*120=200>>200 apartments.
So in every of the 102 - 200 = <<-98*1=-98>>-98 apartments, only one person is living.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 72, not 200. It appears the value was multiplied by the reciprocal of the intended fraction.
